Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!
With great street appeal and presented in pristine condition this quality Urban Edge residence will impress with its great attention to detail and endless host of features. The home comprises of 3 large bedrooms with BIRS, the gorgeous master being a standout with fantastic fitted WIR and ensuite . The impressive kitchen with dual ovens, granite benches, glass splashback and walk in pantry overlooks the dining and living area and with 3 sets of sliding doors accessing the alfresco and large backyard a huge indoor / outdoor entertaining space for family and friends can easily be created. Other features include a second living area, separate study, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar panel system, down lights, tinted windows, alarm, professionally landscaped gardens, double driveway and double garage with remote and internal access.

Sale by Set Date 16/12/2013

Description:
Modern, Unique, Quality, Stylish
Modern, Unique, Quality, Stylish
Beautifully presented and kept stands this uniquely designed modern family home that will cater to all your needs. At approx 39sqs, with its generous open plan living zone and its modern features you will never want to leave home again. Close to schools, parks and shopping with easy access onto the main arterials.
Comprising:-
Wide entrance hall, 4 bedrooms with BIR's, huge master with full en-suite, open plan living, consisting of well equipped kitchen with Caesar stone benches and dining table, butlers kitchen, generous family and dining areas, study, modern bathrooms with ceramic basins, play room, 3 toilets,
alfresco & double remote garage.
Features :- Polished concrete flooring, 3.7m ceilings, 2.9m doors, split system heating/cooling in rooms, C-Bus home automation,
S/S app, quality carpets, d/showers, d/basins, double glazed windows, alarm
& side trailer bay parking all on 800sqms of land.

Description:
PARK VIEW AND CREEK FRONT LIVING!
Have you been looking for the perfect home, in a sought after location, close to quality schools, shops, transport and all other amenities? If so your search is over! Outstanding opportunity for either starting off your investment portfolio or make it your first home.
Features:
The formal lounge room area has an ideal layout to relax and unwind.
A generous sized fully equipped kitchen.
Master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, other 2 bedrooms feature built in robes.
Spacious family & meals area
Separate tiled laundry with access to the backyard.
Separate bathroom and toilet
Extras:
Low maintenance styled front yard and big backyard. A closer look and you will find extras such as split air conditioner, ducted heating and double remote garage with internal and direct access to backyard.
Location:
This excellent property has panoramic views of Bothwell Park which includes playground & swings-great for the kids to play all the year around, facing to creek, handy to Derrimut Primary School & Catholic School, kindergartens, childcares, football oval, public transport, shopping centres and easy access to freeways - everything!

SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!
Offering everything the new home buyer requires , this meticulously well cared for family home promises to be popular. The property consists of 4 bedrooms, master with WIR and double vanity ensuite with oversize shower, open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooking the dining and living area. This leads out to the huge decked alfresco area that spills out into the magnificent backyard with storage shed and easy access through the rear roller door of the double remote garage. An abundance of extra features include separate lounge or rumpus, ducted heating, split system cooling, high ceilings, floating floors, designer window furnishings, alarm, security window shutters, downlights, double driveway and landscaped front and rear gardens. With everything already done for you just move in, relax and enjoy everything this perfect property offers.

Description:
Quality Family home in Prime Location
A fantastic opportunity to secure a magnificent architectural designed home situated in a great sought after location. Within a short walking distance to all amenities including: recreational facilities, parklands, public transport, shops, local schools and much more. This beautifully proportioned home offers a stunning wide entrance and an abundance of features with lots of space for all the family to relax. Bedroom accommodation is generous with luxurious main en-suite with hydro massage bathtub shower combination and double vanities, the other bedrooms consisting of BIRs, also adding large family retreat area where you would enjoy the most beautiful view from balcony. Downstairs with a beautifully presented and practical floor plan, this home comprises a spacious open plan, central living area allowing for a beautiful flow of natural light, a kitchen with stainless steel appliances, good size pantry with ample cupboard space which overlooks the meals/dining area. Also offering a good sized bedroom and large laundry with shower.
The list of features includes refrigerated heating/cooling, granite bench top in all wet areas including kitchen bench top, alarm, beautiful light fitting, inter-com, solar panels x 16 and much more.
With exceptional finishes to this home, take a chance to inspect now to avoid disappointment

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!
Those that appreciate size and space will be immediately drawn to this high quality Porter Davis residence. Incorporating both formal and informal living zones, this homes fantastic design just flows beautifully allowing for fantastic entertaining areas yet very private separate study (can easily be converted to a 5th bedroom) and sleeping quarters that includes a superb master bedroom at the rear of the property with retreat, massive WIR and gorgeous ensuite. A high quality kitchen with granite benches overlooks the dining and living area that lead out to a huge decked alfresco with bi-fold door and adjacent lounge and rumpus make entertaining the masses a breeze. Off street parking is well catered for with double remote garage, extra wide driveway and bonus side access for additional vehicles, the boat or caravan. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, high doors, alarm, bulkheads, water tank, solar panels, landscaped gardens all on a large allotment in excess of 650sqm.

Description:
SOLD CAMERON VUROVECZ
Family living in Derrimut has a new benchmark. Combining cutting-edge design and high quality fittings, this five bedroom, 3 bathroom home will take your breath away. Set on a generous size 604sm (approx) block, this absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family Luxury living in one of Derrimut's finest locations. The interior is instantly eye-catching with its wide entrance superb Grey Ironbark Floors flowing throughout the ground level, Soaring high ceilings and detailed cornices.
The gourmet kitchen highlights the home's luxury and detail with a granite island bench with high gloss cupboards set beneath a feature light. The very best stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooker, glass splashback, soft-closing cabinetry and a walk-in pantry
The four top-floor fitted bedrooms include the luxurious main bedroom with a large walk-in robe and a spacious spa ensuite with Spanish porcelain tiles, double vanity and a separate toilet. The family bathroom features a large bath, shower and a separate powder room. All the bedrooms feature built in robes and a ground-floor study equally suits use as a 5th bedroom.
For leisure, the astounding property offers an exciting variety of indoor and outdoor options. It comprises a large synthetic grassed area for the kids to play and a year round alfresco area with ceiling fan, perfect for entertaining.
Comprehensive appointments include Zoned ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, excellent storage, alarm system, surveillance system, Solar Power, Drive through access, shed and
landscaped gardens. The home is ideally located in the heart of Derrimut and within close proximity to Balmoral Park, schools, transport, freeway and a choice of shopping precincts. Nothing could be finer.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Enter this truly stunning residence set in a prime location among other vibrant homes and parklands in what is widely considered one of the best pockets in Derrimut. Well presented and fantastically designed with sizeable living areas, this house will tick all the boxes for luxurious family living. Open plan kitchen with quality fittings overlooking the family and dining rooms and laundry with ample cupboard space. The Urbanedge Home offers 3 good sized bedrooms with robes, master with en-suite and WIR, central bathroom. The low maintenance outside area will make entertaining easy and enjoyable. Additional features include heating, cooling, alarm, decking alfresco and double remote control garage with internal access. This family friendly home is only a stone's throw from all amenities including Derrimut shopping centre, schools, parks, public transport and freeway access. Inspect today to avoid disappointment

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP!
Are you tired of inspecting all the stock standard homes on the market? Looking for something that just makes you go WOW when you enter without the massive price tag? Then this chic and funky abode with an abundance of upgrades could be exactly what you have been waiting for. Faultlessly presented this residence comprises 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 exquisite bathrooms and fantastic upgraded kitchen featuring 900mm stainless steel appliances, glass splashback and thick Caesar stone bench tops that overlooks the dining and living area. Moving outside you will be blown away by the amazing alfresco area that can be accessed from the living or master bedroom and is complimented by low maintenance gardens. Other features include ducted heating, split system cooling, floating floors, alarm, electric roller shutters, high ceilings, down lights, CCTV security, storage shed and double garage with remote and wide exposed aggregate driveway that can accommodate off street parking for 4 additional vehicles Situated in a quiet court location with no through traffic, a park at the top of the court, Derrimut Village just around the corner and a few extra steps to all other amenities completes this perfect package known as 10 Cashmere Court Derrimut.
Insights: 10 Cashmere Court, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Picture perfect
This exceptional home is set on a large sized allotment of 620spm (approx) with picture perfect landscaped gardens and rock wall fence this is where it starts! Side access leads to a large work shed and is ideal for a handyman or perfect for extra storage space. Offering spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and a full ensuite. Kitchen adjoins to meals area and two inviting living rooms. To further enhance its appeal, faultlessly fitted pergola with a relaxing Jacuzzi to enjoy and separate BBQ area to entertain family and friends while there's plenty of room for the kids to play. Features include remote control garage with rear access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and alarm system just to name a few. Situated close to public transport and just minutes away from parklands, shopping and leisure centres this residence is a delight to inspect and even better to live in.

Description:
Location Is The Key
It ticks all the right boxes, with space, accommodation, great features and a fantastic location! Close to schools, shops and transport this beautifully presented property offers
4 large bedrooms with build in robes (master with spa ensuite and walk in robe) plus open study.
Furthermore is the combined formal lounge and dining area, large modern kitchen with 900 mm appliances hot plates and oven plus dishwasher adjoining meals and family area.
Sparkling central bathroom,
Rumpus room, double garage and lovely entertaining area or alfresco.
The list of other features is endless just to name few: 8 solar panels, monitored alarm system, CCTV security, landscaped low maintenance gardens and all set on a 559sqm approximately land.
Inspections will impress even the fussiest of buyers.
